messages.subject: CT unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: Well hey thanks everybody. I was such a nervous wreck last year doing my portfolio review but I think I did a good job. I know I had read the law says they
messages.messageBody:
Well hey thanks everybody. I was such a nervous wreck last year doing my
portfolio review but I think I did a good job. I know I had read the law
says they only have to see examples but cant comment on the quality. Well
this guy did. I was told the material I was giving my daughter was to hard.
She wanted to do it and did it well so I didnt see a problem.


I think I will just bring one example this year should I get a call. I
figured taking in my daughters report on a Native American tribe she did
will count for Social studies and launguage arts and then bring in a math
assingment she did. I am honestly hopeing ...as bad as this sounds...that if
I do get a phone call and go that the shear site of me being 8 months
pregnant will make him nervous and let me out of there. *L* Anyhow I do have
a list of books the kids read so I will shove that in the folder to.

Thanks for the imput I dont feel so stressed now. I just couldnt figure a
way to show the things you dont do on paper.

Blessings
shelly
